TopicTitle: Battlestar Viper Mk II -- VTOL SSTO

Articles.Content:
So I had seen some posts from people who were making BSG Vipers and I couldn't help myself!

And this is the image it was modeled off of:

I did my best to match the shape with the parts available and this meant going black Looks sort of like a stealth Viper, but the only stealth Viper in the series doesn't look anything like the others...

Video

I'm kind of bummed that my mic is starting to die. Oh well, I'm pretty sure my annotations in the beginning help clear things up lol

If you've only got the time or patience to watch 30 seconds, then click here to see the POV fight scene in the video! Make sure to go HD.

I guess the video is "stock-ish" since I used KerbCam for the camera shots, which is a mod.

UPDATE:

Check out the new and improved, but de-militarized version:

Details

Parts: 129

Engines:

--VTOL: 1 Basic Jet

--Normal: 2 TurboJets, 1 Basic Jet

--Space: 2 LV-909's

Armaments:

--Missiles: 2 Pocket Rockets (Testing/rename needed!)

--Reloadable

She's capable of doing everything an SSTO should, with the added bonus of being able to blow stuff up! The missiles are designed to look somewhat like the cannons on the original Mk II and they should pack a punch, although you'll need to high tail it out of there if you miss as you only get one shot haha

I'll be making a video to help show it off some more here in the future, but in the meantime....

Download!

Updated with 2 VTOL engines for better performance!Mediafire

Download this baby and let me know what you think!

UPDATE: Kittyhawk download -- http://www./view/lirgsayms1crzgs/SSI_Kittyhawk.craft

Action groups

1. Toggle LV-909's

2. Toggle TurboJets

3. Toggle VTOL Jets

4. Toggle Basic Jet

5. Docking port: Undock

0. Toggles Air intakes, brakes and lights. Press this before flying!!

VTOL requires full throttle to lift. Make sure you've toggled off the intakes by pressing 0, zero before you fly it around. The TurboJets and Basic Jet are in different groups because that Basic jet is off center from CoM. It won't make you crash though as the SAS modules keep it in line and it makes for a great booster engine for climbing to 18km during ascent.

Enjoy!

I hope someone likes it. Let me know what you think or if there are any changes you'd like to see to it!

The VSO-3 which has small'ish wings as they aren't the primary lifting surface. It uses mainly brute force to get to space. And it was inspired by the movie "Elysium"
